languages.text: {n}Маражай кривится и нехотя убирает руки от оружия.{/n} "В другой раз, {name}. У меня еще будет возможность".

traits.locale_text: {n}Маражай кривится и нехотя убирает руки от оружия.{/n} "В другой раз, {name}. У меня еще будет возможность".
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanionNPC

languages.text: {n}Marazhai grimaces and removes his hands from his weapons.{/n} "There is always next time, {name}. I will have my chance yet."
languages.original_text: {n}Маражай кривится и нехотя убирает руки от оружия.{/n} "В другой раз, {name}. У меня еще будет возможность".

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai grimaces and removes his hands from his weapons.{/n} "There is always next time, {name}. I will have my chance yet."

languages.text: {n}Marazhai retire les mains de ces armes en grimaçant.{/n} « Il y aura toujours une prochaine fois, {name}. Ma chance viendra, j'en suis convaincu. »
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai grimaces and removes his hands from his weapons.{/n} "There is always next time, {name}. I will have my chance yet."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai retire les mains de ces armes en grimaçant.{/n} « Il y aura toujours une prochaine fois, {name}. Ma chance viendra, j'en suis convaincu. »
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanionNPC

languages.text: {n}マラズハイは顔をしかめ、武器から手を離した。{/n}「またの機会にしておこう、{name}。必ずその日が来るはずだからな」
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai grimaces and removes his hands from his weapons.{/n} "There is always next time, {name}. I will have my chance yet."

traits.locale_text: {n}マラズハイは顔をしかめ、武器から手を離した。{/n}「またの機会にしておこう、{name}。必ずその日が来るはずだからな」
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanionNPC

languages.text: {n}玛拉斋皱着眉头，松开了武器。{/n}“总会有下次的，{name}。我会有机会好好享受。”
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai grimaces and removes his hands from his weapons.{/n} "There is always next time, {name}. I will have my chance yet."

traits.locale_text: {n}玛拉斋皱着眉头，松开了武器。{/n}“总会有下次的，{name}。我会有机会好好享受。”
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanionNPC

languages.text: {n}Marazhai verzieht das Gesicht und nimmt die Hände von seinen Waffen.{/n} "Es wird ein nächstes Mal geben, {name}. Ich bekomme meine Chance schon noch."
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai grimaces and removes his hands from his weapons.{/n} "There is always next time, {name}. I will have my chance yet."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai verzieht das Gesicht und nimmt die Hände von seinen Waffen.{/n} "Es wird ein nächstes Mal geben, {name}. Ich bekomme meine Chance schon noch."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanionNPC

languages.text: {n}Marazhai hace una mueca y aparta las manos de las armas.{/n} «Siempre habrá una próxima vez, {name}. Ya llegará mi oportunidad».
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai grimaces and removes his hands from his weapons.{/n} "There is always next time, {name}. I will have my chance yet."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai hace una mueca y aparta las manos de las armas.{/n} «Siempre habrá una próxima vez, {name}. Ya llegará mi oportunidad».
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanionNPC

languages.text: {n}Marazhai, yüzünü buruşturup sonrasında ellerini silahlarından çekiyor.{/n} "Bir dahaki sefere artık {name}. Ne de olsa elime fırsat geçer."
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai grimaces and removes his hands from his weapons.{/n} "There is always next time, {name}. I will have my chance yet."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai yüzünü buruşturuyor ve ellerini silahlarından çekiyor.{/n} "Bir dahaki sefere artık {name}. Başka fırsatlarım da olur."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanionNPC
